skills.name: Fascinating Symphony
skills.description:
[SP: 0][CD: 17s] Unleashes a sound wave to deal 7 x 100.0% ATK of Lightning DMG, inflict 7 x 1 Paralyze Trauma, and increase the team's Lightning DMG by 15.0% for 20s (cannot stack).
Golden Diva equip bonus: QTE entry auto-casts the skill.
Golden Diva equip bonus: Casting it activates Performance, or Fascination if Performance is already in effect.

skills.name: Splendid Hymn
skills.description: The team deals 10.0% bonus Total DMG (cannot be stack). Upon casting Ultimate, teams on the field deal 12.0% bonus Total DMG for 20s (cannot stack and is canceled by exiting).
